api/BOOSEProgram.AppInt.html.keywords: Class AppInt AppInt class allowing int variables to be created extends from BOOSE int class and overrides restrictions Inheritance object Command Evaluation Int AppInt Implements ICommand Inherited Members Evaluation.expression Evaluation.evaluatedExpression Evaluation.varName Evaluation.value Evaluation.CheckParameters(string[]) Evaluation.ProcessExpression(string) Evaluation.Expression Evaluation.VarName Evaluation.Value Evaluation.Local Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Namespace: BOOSEProgram Assembly: BOOSEProgram.dll Syntax public class AppInt : Int, ICommand Constructors | Edit this page View Source AppInt() constructor for App int class Declaration public AppInt() Methods | Edit this page View Source Compile() Compile method from original class to be overwritten error handling for compilation Declaration public override void Compile() Overrides BOOSE.Int.Compile() | Edit this page View Source Execute() Execute method from original class to be overwritten with additional error handling for execution. e.g. if the variable cannot be parsed as an int - throw error Declaration public override void Execute() Overrides BOOSE.Int.Execute() | Edit this page View Source Restrictions() Restriction method overriden to do nothing This allows more int variables to be set Declaration public override void Restrictions() Overrides BOOSE.Int.Restrictions() Implements BOOSE.ICommand

exception thrown Declaration public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameters) Parameters Type Name Description string[] parameters Overrides AppArray.CheckParameters(string[]) | Edit this page View Source Compile() processes array parameters for peek for compile: split parameter list into parameters by a space assing peek variable with first index create peek parameter list: -assigning AppArray.Compile() | Edit this page View Source Execute() processes array parameters for peek for execution: evaluates the expressions for row size, column size and poke value tries to parse values to int throw Argument exception if row size(rowS) and column size (colS) cannot be parsed for int and real array try to: parse as int or real - throws parser exception if it cannot if it can be parsed call get int/real array and update peek variable with value int or real Declaration public override void Execute() Overrides AppArray.Execute() Implements BOOSE.ICommand

api/BOOSEProgram.html.title: Namespace BOOSEProgram | benferro documentation
api/BOOSEProgram.html.keywords: Namespace BOOSEProgram Classes AppAboutBoose class replacing about boose AppArray AppArray class allowing >2 arrays to be set Replaces BOOSE Array Class functionality Extends evaluation AppBoolean AppBoolean class to replace boolean boose class AppCanvas AppCanvas Class provides canvas for drawing commands to be displayed on a bitmap AppCommandFactory AppCommandFactory class extending command factory to allow for new commands to be created AppEnd class for end command allowing end commands for while and if AppFor AppFor class AppIf AppInt class allowing int variables to be created extends from original int class but new class will be rewritten to remove restrictions on how many int variables can be created AppInt AppInt class allowing int variables to be created extends from BOOSE int class and overrides restrictions AppParser class to replace BOOSE Parser AppPeek AppPeek class replacing peek functionality BOOSE peek class extends array, AppPeek Class extends AppArray AppPoke AppPoke class replacing poke functionality BOOSE poke class extends array, AppPoke Class extends AppArray AppReal AppReal class allowing real variables to be created extends from original real class AppTriangle AppTriangle class allowing for triangle command to be implemented AppWhile AppWhile class AppWrite AppWrite class allowing for write text method to be implemented BOOSEAdapter Adapter Design Pattern: BOOSE adapter class to allow for testing of methods such as drawto when mocking in unit test file. BooseInterpreter Form Class allowing user to pass drawing commands to the canvas Interfaces IBOOSEAdapter Interface that represents behaviour of boose form
